item.title: Do You Know the Shocking Secret Behind the Correct Spelling of 'Cream'? Find Out Now!
item.description: Introduction to the Shocking Secret Behind the Correct Spelling of ‘Cream’ Do you know why the word “cream” is spelled with two ’e’s? Have you ever wondered why it’s not spelled “crem” or “cram”? Well, the answer is actually quite shocking. Read on to find out the secret behind the correct spelling of cream. The Origin of the Spelling of Cream The origin of the word “cream” dates back to the Old English word “crem” which was derived from the Proto-Indo-European root “krem”.
